thread.title: Trump family trips cost taxpayers $11.3m in one month – almost as much as Obama’s cost in a year - Independent.ie
thread.title_full: Trump family trips cost taxpayers $11.3m in one month – almost as much as Obama’s cost in a year - Independent.ie

author: Peter Walker
title: Trump family trips cost taxpayers $11.3m in one month – almost as much as Obama’s cost in a year - Independent.ie
text: News President Trump Sunday 19 February 2017 Trump family trips cost taxpayers $11.3m in one month – almost as much as Obama’s cost in a year Jaunts to estate in Mar-a-Lago, and secret service charges for his son's business trips across the globe, are costing American taxpayers Peter Walker 0 Comments Share Trump family trips cost taxpayers $11.3m in one month – almost as much as Obama’s cost in a year Independent.ie Donald Trump’s family trips have cost taxpayers nearly as much in a month as Barack Obama’s cost in an entire year. http://www.independent.ie/world-news/north-america/president-trump/trump-family-trips-cost-taxpayers-113m-in-one-month-almost-as-much-as-obamas-cost-in-a-year-35463238.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35463237.ece/b7359/AUTOCROP/h342/US%20Trump%20Abe%200.jpg President Donald Trump, second from right, and first lady Melania Trump, right, stop to pose for a photo with Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, second from left, and his wife Akie Abe, left, before they have dinner at Mar-a-Lago in Palm Beach, Fla. (AP Photo/Susan Walsh) Donald Trump’s family trips have cost taxpayers nearly as much in a month as Barack Obama’s cost in an entire year.
